title: Wesfarmers outlines growth opportunities amid 18-month lithium ramp-up and expanding retail initiatives
excerpt: Discover key takeaways from Wesfarmers' Q2 2025 earnings call: solid growth led by Bunnings & Kmart, lithium project updates, and insights into future...

html:
Earnings Call Insights: Wesfarmers Limited (OTCPK:WFAFF) Q2 2025

Management View

  • CEO Rob Scott highlighted a net profit after tax of $1.5 billion, representing a 2.9% increase, and a fully franked dividend of $0.95 per share, a 4.1% rise from the prior period. He emphasized strong performance from Bunnings
